TopicTitle: We all knew Jeb would strap his new Lazy-Boy to a booster one day!

Articles.Content: Edited May 15, 2013 by Capt'n Skunky
That can only end well.

I.... I.... I don't know how to respond to this.

Launch it and post a picture mid-flight

He won't, because now we ALL know we're going to do that first thing in .19.2 or .20, whichever comes first. Probably .20, as HarvestR did rewrite some VAB stuff regarding root parts, and that's its own whole other story.
This idea is prefect. What could possibly go wrong?
For some reason I feel like Jeb should be wearing a cowboy hat in that picture...
I'd love to see a complete re-make of Dr. Strangelove done with just Kerbals.
When 0.20 comes out we should have a megathread titled "Show us your Kerbals Strapped to SRBs"

This is what I miss about the dev stream.

The news page is nice, but its not devs screwing around with new toys.

Jeb is going to love .20

At least until he dies in a ball of fire and glory.

~snip~

I'd love to see a complete re-make of Dr. Strangelove done with just Kerbals.

I was just about to post a Strangelove reference. Same page...same page...
Does this mean we are going to have an awesome stream this friday?
Can't wait for 0.20! I brought Jeb back all the way from Laythe so he could ride a booster.

Something I didn't notice at first but is shown in the photo is that we can build on Launch Clamps now. Nice job hiding that where we didn't look, Capt'n. I look forward to easier boarding procedures for my oversized ships in .20

He won't, because now we ALL know we're going to do that first thing in .19.2 or .20, whichever comes first. Probably .20, as HarvestR did rewrite some VAB stuff regarding root parts, and that's its own whole other story.

All? Nope. My first idea was to put one of those seats on a looooong line of girders and dock it to space station. That would be the place for Jeb to sit and think about Universe and Everything.
And so it begins.

This idea is prefect. What could possibly go wrong?

Absolutely nothing.
Am I imagining things or does the background mountain look different?

I'd love to see a complete re-make of Dr. Strangelove done with just Kerbals.

I've been trying to recreate that shot, but I can't keep Jeb on the ladder.

Jeb is going to love .20

At least until he dies in a ball of fire and glory.

When shortly thereafter he'll presumably be resurrected in an identical blaze of glory, only to die again when glory turns to fire?

On another note, I was planning on attempting to make an emergency reentry pod for my big reusable ships, in the case that they begin to break up/ crash, to save at least the expensive and highly trained pilot.
Awesome, I want to build an array of those and fire a salvo of kerbals! if they only had personal parachutes as well we could try targetted landings
This... this... is beautiful!

i am speechless ...

cdr zeta

From my old seats mod made possible by srf awesome plugin some months ago, made some better ones but waiting for the seat update

Look forward to seeing how the new module works and if its as locked as internalseat are ^^ cheers
